alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 22 at 10:34AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jones, southeastern Craven, eastern Onslow, southern Pamlico and Carteret Counties through 1115 AM EST... At 1033 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Neuse Forest, or near Havelock, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, Newport, Cedar Island, Stella, South River, North River, Sealevel, Davis, Merrimon, Atlantic, Harlowe, Otway, Janeiro, Great Neck, Riverdale, Williston, Whortonsville, and Croatan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Onslow; East Carteret; Jones; Pamlico; Southern Craven; West Carteret
